TopicTitle: What Silly Mods Do You Play KSP With?

Articles.Content:
What Silly Mods Do You Play KSP With? What Mods Do You Use Just to make you laugh? i mainly use the nyan cat mod ([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100953-NyanCat-1-0-KSP-0-25-0-90-1-0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100953-NyanCat-1-0-KSP-0-25-0-90-1-0)) and bargain Rockets ([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58639-0-24-Bargain-Rocket-Parts-v1-1-Bust-out-the-duct-tape-we-re-going-to-space!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58639-0-24-Bargain-Rocket-Parts-v1-1-Bust-out-the-duct-tape-we-re-going-to-space!)) But What do the rest of you guys use?

Here is a video of me just messing about with some silly mods.
